knimeNode.name: Extract Regions from UCM
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts the regions from an ultra-metric contour map (UCM).

fullDescription.intro: Extracts the regions from an ultra-metric contour map (UCM) by thresholding it at each available intensity level and performing a connected component analysis on each of them.
fullDescription.option: Regions with less boundary pixels will be skipped.
Regions with a boundary intensity less then specified will be skipped.
